comments:
Build Id N20060425 - Mac OSX

When the perspective & coolbar devider is dragged far enough to start overlapping the coolbar items and forcing the chevrons to appear, the chevron for the annotations bar seems to stop working once the overlapping over passes the "Previous Anotations" button.

Steps to reproduce:
1) On a Mac, open the java perspective
2) Drag the annotations bar onto a second line
3) Start pulling the perspective/coolbar devider over until the "Previous Annotation" button has been covered
4) Try using the chevron to access the other buttons - At this point to chevron button should dissapear, leaving a blank white space and you won't be able to access the other buttons.
Shaun, when you attach the stacktrace could you identify which 'group' is the bad one...thanks.

It's the Anotation Navigation coolbar group
If this is a regression, should we consider this one for RC3?
